rdf:Description.dc:title: The Three Voyages of William Barents to the Arctic Regions (1594, 1595, and 1596)
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Gerrit de Veer (ca. 1570–1598)
Charles Tilstone Beke (1800–1874)
Laurens Reinhart Koolemans Beynen (1852–1879)
rdf:Description.dc:rights: This eBook is for the use of anyone anywhere at no cost and with almost no restrictions whatsoever. You may copy it, give it away or re-use it under the terms of the Project Gutenberg License included with this eBook or online at www.gutenberg.org. This eBook is produced by the Online Distributed Proofreading Team at www.pgdp.net. Several of the plates spread over two pages in this book. Those plates have been recombined, however, a vertical stroke of these images in the gutter could not be scanned, and is thus left white. These plates appear to have been redrawn for this English edition, and differ in numerous details from the illustrations in 17th century editions. Scans are available from the Internet Archive (copy 1), as wel as scans of the first edition (copy 1, 2). Scans of the original English 1609 edition are also available on the Internet Archive. Further editions in the orginal Dutch and various translations can also be found there.
